pricing.faq1Question: Can I cancel at any time?
pricing.faq1Answer: Yes! You can cancel your subscription anytime without penalties or additional fees.
pricing.faq2Question: How does the trial period work?
pricing.faq2Answer: New Premium users get 7 days to test all features. Cancel before the end and you won't be charged.
pricing.faq3Answer: Absolutely! We use end-to-end encryption and you have full control over your data, being able to export or delete it whenever you want.
pricing.faq4Answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade anytime. Changes are applied immediately.
pricing.faq5Answer: We accept credit card, debit card, and PIX through Stripe, our secure payment platform.
pricing.faq6Answer: You'll continue to have access to Premium features until the end of the paid period. After that, your account returns to the free plan.
pricing.faqPrivacyQuestion: How does Luna protect my privacy?
pricing.faqPrivacyDescription: We use end-to-end encryption, don't share data with third parties, and you have full control to export or delete your data anytime.
pricing.faqAIDescription: Our AI analyzes your cycle patterns, mood, symptoms, and habits to generate personalized insights and recommendations adapted to your current hormonal moment.
pricing.faqCancelDescription: Yes! You can cancel anytime without fees or penalties. Just access your account settings.
pricing.faqCancelProcessQuestion: How does the cancellation process work?
pricing.faqCancelProcessDescription: You can cancel anytime through your account subscription settings. No hassle, no questions asked.
pricing.readyDescription: Join thousands of women who are already taking better care of themselves with Luna
